com.koverse.sdk.ingest.format

Class AbstractRecordStream<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.ingest.format.AbstractRecordStream<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data that is streamed.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RawRecordStream<T>, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLongLivedRecordStream, AbstractSimpleRecordStream

    public abstract class AbstractRecordStream<T>
extends Object
implements RawRecordStream<T>
    Abstract version of the RecordStream that handles closing semantics correctly. Note that it is a little trickier than it seems so you are better off subclassing from this than recreating it yourself.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractRecordStream() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Calls doClose() only the first time it is called.
      protected abstract void doClose()
      Guaranteed to only be called one time: the first time closed is called.
      protected abstract T doNextRecordMaybeCanceled()
      Guaranteed to only be called if not closed but may still be canceled.
      protected abstract void doSetup()
      Guaranteed to only be called one time; on the first call to nextRecord().
      protected boolean isClosed() 
      T nextRecord()
      Checks to see if closed, throws an exception if it is.

      • nextRecord

        public final T nextRecord()
                   throws IOException
        Checks to see if closed, throws an exception if it is. Normally just calls doNextRecord().
        Specified by:
        nextRecord in interface RawRecordStream<T>
        Returns:
        Object, null when done
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isClosed

        protected final boolean isClosed()

      • doSetup

        protected abstract void doSetup()
                         throws IOException
        Guaranteed to only be called one time; on the first call to nextRecord(). Always called before doNextRecord().
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • doNextRecordMaybeCanceled

        protected abstract T doNextRecordMaybeCanceled()
                                        throws IOException
        Guaranteed to only be called if not closed but may still be canceled. doSetup() will be called before this is called for the first time.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • doClose

        protected abstract void doClose()
                         throws IOException
        Guaranteed to only be called one time: the first time closed is called.
        Throws:
        IOException
